start: ^Yeah, good morning! What can I get for you?

c-1: ^You got it! Good to see you. Can I get some
g-0: ^How's business going? I remember you said that you run this place yourself.
^Pretty good! It can get kind of overwhelming but this is my passion.

c-2: ^That makes sense. If you're passionate about something it can make the work worth it!

g-1: ^Did you go to school for anything or did you know you were gonna open a cafe?
^I went to university but it wasn't a great time.
^Both! I went to school for business since I knew I would have to be pretty business-savvy.

c-4: ^Damn, sorry to hear that. At least you found success after!
c-5: ^That's so cool...you know how to run all the different aspects of a cafe.

g-2: ^I'm actually in business school right now...alongside my internship. Unpaid, of course.
^That's rough-- hopefully you're getting really good experience since it's unpaid.

c-6: ^It's alright...I just wish I could work a regular job already. Interning sucks.

g-3: ^Thanks for the coffee. It really helps keep me to get through my internship days.
^I'm happy it can help! You're working super hard, good luck with everything!
